name: Glumph
description:
Submission for Mini Game Jam 79: Frogs

Glumph is a frog catching game.

Catch frogs with your bare hands, watch out for the poisonous ones though!

Deposit caught frogs at the shop for points and watch them bounce around the pen.

Use the earned points to upgrade or purchase equipment to catch poisonous and bigger frogs!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

LMB - Interact

P/Esc - Pause Menu

1, 2, 3, 4 - Select Item for Use

THANKYOU FOR PLAYING! I had an absolute blast making this.

Credits:

All models and programming by myself : BJ Games

Music from YT audio library : Meet & Fun by OfShane

SFX from freesound.org and YT Audio Library

Croak - BetterChinese

Electric Shock - Glen Curtis Adams

Tips: 

Net is for poison frogs

Traps are for big frogs (also work on any frog, just select, aim at ground and LMB to deploy)

Shocker will freeze frogs for 5 seconds

If you find frogs get caught against the outer wall you can push against them to turn them around, same for in the water against the lilypads.
